pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:0.4: The sub-chapter on sunshades and sandals
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:0.5: 91. The training rules on getting trainee nuns to massage
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:1.2: At that time the nuns were getting trainee nuns to massage and rub them.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:1.3: When people who were walking about the dwellings saw this, they complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:1.4: “How can nuns get trainee nuns to massage and rub them? They are just like householders who indulge in sensual pleasures.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:1.5: The nuns heard the complaints of those people.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:1.6: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:1.7: “How can nuns get trainee nuns to massage and rub them?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:1.8: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:1.11: How can nuns get trainee nuns to massage and rub them?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:1.12: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:1.13: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:1.14: ‘If a nun gets a trainee nun to massage her or to rub her, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:2.1.6: one who has trained for two years in the six rules.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:2.1.12: if she gets massaged, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:2.1.14: if she gets rubbed, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:2.2.5: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:2.2.6: The tenth training rule is finished.
